alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Lee; Prentiss; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 11:40AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Itawamba, northern Lee, southern Tishomingo and southern Prentiss Counties through 1215 PM CDT... At 1140 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Baldwyn, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Baldwyn, Red Bay, Saltillo, Guntown, Belmont, Mantachie, Sandy Springs, Fairview, Blair, Wheeler, Pratts Friendship, Marietta, Golden, Eastman, Chapelville, Thrasher, Dennis, Moores Mill, Kirkville and Unity. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for northeastern Mississippi.
